Minestrone Soup

2/5/2021
soupmain

Delicious

Ingredients

  • 8 oz of dried chickpeas (like half the package) soaked in water for at least 6 hours
  • beef bone broth (a bit)
  • bacon (like half the package)
  • 1 yellow onion
  • 1 small carrot
  • 1 celery stalk
  • tomato paste
  • garlic
  • oregano
  • basil
  • thyme
  • salt
  • pepper
